description.english: Deal 100 damage with a single spell.
Deal 1000 damage with a single spell.
Deal 2500 damage with a single spell.
Deal 5000 damage with a single spell.
Deal 10000 damage with a single spell.
Defeat all bosses in Chillpine Forest in master mode (except rare bosses).
Defeat all bosses in Glenwood in master mode (except rare bosses).
Defeat Lord Gerrimonde and Ogre King Drek'Gor.
Complete Battlemaster of Chillpine, Battlemaster of Glenwood, and Battlemaster of Rustridge.
Complete all the quests in Wintervale.
Complete all the quests in Chillpine Forest.
Complete all the quests in Glenwood.
Complete all the quests in Rustridge.
Complete Loremaster of Wintervale, Loremaster of Chillpine, Loremaster of Glenwood and Loremaster of Rustridge.
Loot or forge 2 stardust collectable items.
Loot or forge 5 stardust collectable items.
Loot or forge 1 prismatic collectable item.
Loot or forge 1 ultimate prismatic collectable item.
Defeat a boss that is at least 75% of your threat rating without taking any damage.
Cast a damaging spell 10 turns in a row.
Deal damage with a x5 advantage.
Deal 1000 tactical attacks with x3 or more advantage.
Defeat a boss encounter of atleast (75%) of your threat rating by only moving and casting spells with 1 piece.
Recieve damage from a x4 tactical advantage attack and win the battle without losing any pieces.
Defeat 5 encounters that have a skull threat rating to you.
Critically heal a warrior with Lionheart to prevent death from damage exceeding 2000.
Obtain Tordenbreaker from the dwarves of Moraine.
Obtain a rare (purple) old world item.
Obtain an epic (orange) old world item.
Loot 5 rare (purple) items in resource mode.
Fork 4 pieces with the Dark Knight.
Deal 3 Revenge attacks in one turn.
Deal 3 damaging critical strikes in 3 turns.
Deal 10 tactical attacks in a row.
Defeat a skull threat rating encounter while starting the battle with only 3 pieces.
Fork 2 or more pieces and skewer at least one of them with an archer.
Fork 2 pieces and skewer both of the forked pieces with a mage or priest.
Fork 3 pieces with a mage or priest that are not in melee range.
